import { Component, Input } from "@angular/core"; import { Post } from "@app/shared/mocks"; @Component({ selector: "app-course-card", templateUrl: "./course-card.component.html", styleUrls: ["./course-card.component.scss"], }) export class CourseCardComponent { math = Math; @Input() post: Post | null = null; }
